name: 马丁·路德·金
bio: 美国民权运动领袖，非暴力抗争的倡导者。领导蒙哥马利公车抵制运动、向华盛顿进军，发表我有一个梦想演说。1964年获诺贝尔和平奖。1968年在孟菲斯遇刺身亡。
bio_en: Leader of the American civil rights movement and advocate of nonviolent resistance. Led the Montgomery Bus Boycott, the March on Washington, and delivered the iconic 'I Have a Dream' speech. Awarded the Nobel Peace Prize in 1964. Assassinated in Memphis in 1968 at the age of 39.

personalEvents.title: 蒙哥马利公车抵制
personalEvents.description: 领导黑人抵制种族隔离的公共汽车，历时381天
personalEvents.description_en: Leads African Americans in boycott of segregated buses for 381 days

personalEvents.title: 我有一个梦想
personalEvents.description: 在华盛顿林肯纪念堂前发表著名演说
personalEvents.description_en: Delivers iconic speech at the Lincoln Memorial during the March on Washington

personalEvents.title: 获诺贝尔和平奖
personalEvents.description: 因非暴力抗争获诺贝尔和平奖
personalEvents.description_en: Awarded Nobel Peace Prize for nonviolent resistance to racial injustice

personalEvents.title: 遇刺身亡
